prodNameC: 亞培設計師骨髓過氧化酶檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
ARCHITECT MPO Reagent Kit (100 Tests / 500 Tests) 
Microparticles 1 Bottle (6.6 mL/27.0 mL) Anti-MPO coated microparticles in TRIS buffer with protein stabilizer.
 
Conjugate 1 Bottle (5.9 mL/26.3 mL) Anti-MPO F(Ab’)2 acridinium-labeled conjugate in MES buffer with protein stabilizer.


ARCHITECT MPO Calibrators
6 Bottles (4.0 mL each) of ARCHITECT MPO Calibrators. The calibrators yield the following concentrations:
	MPO Concentration
Calibrator	pmol/L	ng/mL
CAL A	0	0.0
CAL B	500	72.5
CAL C	1500	217.5
CAL D	3000	435.0
CAL E	5000	725.0
CAL F	10000	1450.0


ARCHITECT MPO Controls
3 Bottles (8.0 mL each) of ARCHITECT MPO Controls contain MPO in MES buffer with protein stabilizers. The following ranges may be used for individual replicate control specifications on the ARCHITECT i system:
	Target	Range
Control	pmol/L	ng/mL	pmol/L	ng/mL
Control L	400	58.0	240 – 560	34.8 – 81.2
Control M	1200	174.0	840 – 1560	121.8 – 226.2
Control H	3600	522.0	2520 – 4680	365.4 – 678.6
applicantName: 美商亞培股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民生東路三段49號5樓、6樓及51號6樓
efficacy: ARCHITECT MPO分析是一種化學冷光微粒免疫分析法（CMIA），可用於具有STAT功能之ARCHITECT i系統上定量測試人類EDTA血漿中之骨髓過氧化酶（Myeloperoxidase，MPO）。
mdFormat: ARCHITECT MPO Reagent Kit (100 Tests / 500 Tests) ARCHITECT MPO CalibratorsARCHITECT MPO Controls

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5660 多發性自體抗體免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 100/200 ABBOTT PARK ROAD, ABBOTT PARK, ILLINOIS 60064, U.S.A.

factoryDtoList.factoryName: FISHER DIAGNOSTICS, A DIVISION OF FISHER SCIENTIFIC COMPANY, LLC, A SUBSIDIARY OF THERMO FISHER
